original_title: Shemp Cocktail: A Toast to the Original Stooge
overview: A compilation that highlights works from the Three Stooges. It includes the shorts Brideless Groom, Sing a Song of Six Pants, and Malice in the Palace, also Ed Wynn's live TV Camel Comedy Caravan starring Shemp, Larry, and Moe.
title: Shemp Cocktail: A Toast to the Original Stooge
